sentence.Network_en: They don't know what they're talking about and mangle scientific information.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不知所云，把科学知识讲得错误百出。

sentence.Network_en: There is almost no phrase so simple that he cannot mangle it.
sentence.Network_cn: 几乎再简单的话他也表达不清。

sentence.Network_en: Mangle doesn't increase the damage of Maul and Shred anymore.
sentence.Network_cn: 裂伤不再增加重殴和撕碎的伤害.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Dutch mangel, from mangelen 'to mangle', from medieval Latin mango, manga, from Greek manganon 'axis, engine'
late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French mahangler, apparently a frequentative of mahaignier 'maim'

entry.def: If a physical object is mangled, it is crushed or twisted very forcefully, so that it is difficult to see what its original shape was.

example.ex: His body was crushed and mangled beyond recognition.
example.tran: 他的身体被压得血肉模糊，根本无法辨认。

entry.tran: （因发音、书写错误或表达不清晰而）扭曲，改变（词语、信息的意思）
entry.def: If you say that someone mangles words or information, you are criticizing them for not speaking or writing clearly or correctly.

example.ex: There is almost no phrase so simple that he cannot mangle it...
example.tran: 几乎再简单的话他也表达不清。

example.ex: They don't know what they're talking about and mangle scientific information.
example.tran: 他们不知所云，把科学知识讲得错误百出。

entry.tran: (旧时由两个木制滚筒辗压衣服的）轧干机，脱水机
entry.def: A mangle is an old-fashioned machine for removing water from clothes that have been washed. The clothes are squeezed between two wooden cylinders.

means.word_mean: 1. clothes dryer for drying and ironing laundry by passing it between two heavy heated rollers
3. alter so as to make unrecognizable;

auth_sentence.content: She threw it on the floor and tried to mangle the pictures with her heels.
auth_sentence.res_content: She threw it on the floor and tried to mangle the pictures with her heels.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She threw it on the floor and tried to mangle the pictures with her heels.

auth_sentence.content: Thoughts, my tormentors, armed with deadly stings, Mangle my apprehensive tenderest parts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thoughts, my tormentors, armed with deadly stings, Mangle my apprehensive tenderest parts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thoughts, my tormentors, armed with deadly stings, Mangle my apprehensive tenderest parts.

auth_sentence.content: Mangle other animal life all you want, but manipulating microscopic human cells... now you've gone too far.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mangle other animal life all you want, but manipulating microscopic human cells... now you've gone too far.

sentences.en: the mangled remains of the bomber’s van
sentences.cn: 炸弹袭击者车子的残骸

sentences.en: He was off work because he’d mangled his hand in a machine.
sentences.cn: 他没上班,因为他的手给机器严重压伤了。
